capability.name: Order Allocation
capability.definition: This Service Domain allocates partially fulfilled market trades
capability.role: Apply appropriate rules to allocate a completed or partially completed block order across the customers placing the constituent market orders
capability.example: A large market order is partly fulfilled and the pricing and allocation of the trade is allocated across the counterparties

key_features.name: Review allocation rules for partially completed market orders
key_features.description: Enables review allocation rules for partially completed market orders to support this service domain allocates partially fulfilled market trades

key_features.name: Allocate traded securities in accordance with allocation rules
key_features.description: Enables allocate traded securities in accordance with allocation rules to support this service domain allocates partially fulfilled market trades

key_features.name: Provide allocation details as requested
key_features.description: Enables provide allocation details as requested to support this service domain allocates partially fulfilled market trades
